subject: Watching Myself
text:
After shaking
off the fault
      the golden thigh ruptured

and I moved into
the aneurism of
      a drop.

Realization was the key
to enter the curve
       of a moving circle.

The time had come
to take off the jacket
       and penetrate a new

body of knowledge.
Budha was me
       And I was the tree near waterice

Seeds
were falling
       on a lake.
